short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn all images into Shashin aka god almighty

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On any page you are going to images will be replaced to random pictures of Shashin. These pictures are chosen at random from 5 different images. The name ONS is a replacement for ONG since Shashin is pretty much a god.

Go to any page to see the images replaced from what they are suppose to be to pictures of Shashin.
